actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
Referred to Subcommittee on Human Rights and International Organizations.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Human Rights and International Organizations

official_title: A resolution objecting to the scheduled hangings in South Africa on June 9, 1983, of Thelle Simon Mogoerane, Jerry Semano Mosololi, and Marcus Thabo Motaung.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues
subjects_top_term: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Expresses the support of the House of Representatives for the granting of clemency to Thelle Simon Mogoerane, Jerry Semano Mosololi, and Marcus Thabo Motaung, scheduled to be hanged in South Africa. Urges the President to convey U.S. objections to South Africa.

titles.title: A resolution objecting to the scheduled hangings in South Africa on June 9, 1983, of Thelle Simon Mogoerane, Jerry Semano Mosololi, and Marcus Thabo Motaung.
